welcomeTitle: Welcome to Noble Riviera Villa Nika by Irundo
welcomeText: We’re delighted to have you as our guest! Relax and enjoy your stay in the peaceful hills of Veprinac overlooking Opatija and the Adriatic Sea.
arrivalIntro: Everything you need for a smooth arrival.
access1: The villa is located within a fenced courtyard with an automatic gate.
access2: Enter the access code provided on the day of arrival.
access3: If the gate opens halfway, use the remote (in keybox) to open it fully.
entrance1: Keypad is on the right side of the entrance gate.
entrance2: Use the code received from your host to enter.
entrance3: Please keep the entrance closed when not in use.
parking1: Private parking for up to 4 cars inside the fenced villa courtyard.
parking2: Access is via automatic gate (keypad or remote).
parking3: In case of power outage, use manual key.
arrivalTip: Please contact your host at least 1 hour before arrival to arrange access and greeting.
aboutIntro: Elegant, spacious, and designed for unforgettable relaxation in the hills above Opatija.
aboutMain: Villa Nika accommodates up to 8 guests across 4 luxurious bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, balconies, and Smart TVs. The villa features 450 m² of interior space, an infinity pool, sauna, jacuzzi, gym, and stunning sea views.
aboutList2: Sea-view living room with terrace and infinity pool
aboutList3: Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances
aboutList5: Private sauna, jacuzzi, and gym in basement
aboutList6: High-speed Wi-Fi, air conditioning, floor heating
aboutList7: Private parking for 4 cars within gated area
guideIntro: All you need to know about using appliances, spa, and comfort systems.
waterText: Tap water is drinkable. Hot water comes from the basement boiler automatically.
coolingText: All rooms have air conditioners. Use the same mode (Cooling or Heating) in every room. Living room has a wall thermostat. Bathrooms have towel warmers.
heatingText: Floor heating and air conditioners provide warmth. Use thermostats to adjust.
tvText: Smart TVs in all rooms. Use TVIP remote for channels and Samsung remote for apps like Netflix or YouTube.
saunaText: Located in the basement. Press the top power button to turn on, use middle button for light/mode, and adjust temperature with rotary dial. Shower before use and limit sessions to 15 minutes.
poolText: Infinity pool and jacuzzi with automatic cleaning. Shower before use and supervise children.
addonsIntro: Enhance your stay with our exclusive services.
localIntro: Explore Opatija and the Riviera like a local.
tipTransportText: Find your way and keep up with traffic updates.
tipExploreText: Discover Opatija’s beaches, cafés, and restaurants.
tipServicesText: Essential contacts and links for your stay.
contactIntro: We’re always available for your comfort.
departureIntro: Before you leave, a few reminders for a smooth check-out.
departure2: Contact your host a day before departure to confirm check-out time
departure3: Luggage storage or porter service available on request
